capability.name: Loyalty Management
capability.definition: Administer the booking and remittance of rewards points
capability.role: Track/log the allocation and remittance of rewards points. The service domain acts as a transaction log similar where the instrument is not subject to interest considerations (as with cash) but may have a finite life-time with expiry dates on reward points
capability.example: A customer transaction that generates reward points is captured on the log, resulting in an increase in their available point balance

key_features.name: Capture reward points awards and remittance transactions
key_features.description: Enables capture reward points awards and remittance transactions to support administer the booking and remittance of rewards points

key_features.name: Process reward point expiry terms for limited life reward points
key_features.description: Enables process reward point expiry terms for limited life reward points to support administer the booking and remittance of rewards points
